plot: A writer named Algernon (but called Harry by his friends) buys a picture of a boat on a lake, and his obsession with it renders normal life impossible. He attempts to function again by consulting an analyst and becoming married, but eventually succumbs to his strange anxiety by disappearing into the picture.
title: Què hi fa, una noia tan bonica com tu, en un lloc com aquest?
plot_es: A writer named Algernon (but called Harry by his friends) buys a picture of a boat on a lake, and his obsession with it renders normal life impossible. original_name: What's a Nice Girl Like You Doing in a Place Like This?
